short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows user to see the definition of a scientific term on the jack kruse website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This helper extension is for use with the website jackkruse.com. It allows you to add words and their definitions to a dictionary and then have them displayed (by clicking on the word) in the jack kruse blog you are reading.
